```{r setup, include=FALSE}

source("osmar_graph.R")
make(pgh_plan)
loadd(lazy = TRUE)
```


```{r tiny}
node_positions <- tiny_tidy_graph %>% activate(nodes) %>% as_tibble() %>% select(x = lon, y = lat)
tiny_layout <- create_layout(tiny_tidy_graph, layout = "manual", node.positions = node_positions)

ggraph(tiny_layout) +
  geom_edge_link(aes(color = bridge), alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_edge_color_manual(values = c("black", "red")) +
  theme_graph()
```
